name: find css selector
content:
<style>
.life-is-an-egg-top { width: 320px; height: 50px; }
@media(min-width: 500px) { .life-is-an-egg-top { width: 468px; height: 60px; } }
@media(min-width: 800px) { .life-is-an-egg-top { width: 728px; height: 90px; } }
</style>

<style>
.medscientist { width: 320px; height: 50px; }
@media(min-width: 500px) { .medscientist { width: 468px; height: 60px; } }
@media(min-width: 800px) { .medscientist { width: 728px; height: 90px; } }
</style>
